# Claims {#claims}

## PhD student annual funding

**How to submit a claim**

1.  Make sure expenditure authorized by SJB in advance

2.  Contact accounts\@psychol.cam.ac.uk to receive your annual funding account code

3.  Download the appropriate claim form [here](https://www.finance.admin.cam.ac.uk/expense-forms).

    -   For students this will be form FD1A

    -   For example Emily used 'student not paid via payroll' form (since her funding comes from outside the department)

4.  Complete the claim form and send to accounts\@psychol.cam.ac.uk

    -   Attach an image of all receipts

    -   Cc' SJB and ask for authorization
